app.title: Piu host
app.author: Moddable
app.description: Host for applications that use the Piu user interface framework

mods.title: Hello, World
mods.description: Basic Hello, World

mods.title: Hello, World - Color
mods.description: Hello, World with colored background and text

mods.title: Hello, World - Tappable
mods.description: Tap the screen to spell out Hello, World

mods.title: Hello, World - Ticking
mods.description: Hello, World spelled out one letter at a time

mods.title: JavaScript Logo
mods.description: Displays the JavaScript logo onscreen

mods.title: Keyboard
mods.description: Displays an expanding onscreen keyboard designed for small screens

mods.title: Scrolling Text
mods.description: Scrolls content vertically

mods.title: Multiple Screens
mods.description: A starter app that demonstrates how to create applications with multiple screens

mods.title: Anchors
mods.description: Demonstrates a basic use of Piu anchors to create an animated user interface. When you tap the Start button, the background and a colored square flash between two different colors.

mods.title: Background Color
mods.description: Displays onscreen buttons that change the background color of the screen.

mods.title: Color Scheme
mods.description: Displays onscreen buttons that change the appearance of the application between light and dark modes.

mods.title: Colored Squares
mods.description: Demonstrates a basic use of Piu templates and "instantiating data". Displays three different colored squares onscreen.

mods.title: Counter
mods.description: Tap the + button to increment the counter.

mods.title: Graph
mods.description: Demonstrates how to efficiently render a real-time bar graph using a Piu Port object.

mods.title: Mask Icon
mods.description: Displays an icon stored as a mask.

mods.title: Navigation Bar
mods.description: Demonstrates a basic use of Piu templates and "instantiating data". Displays a simple navigation bar.

mods.title: Rounded Buttons
mods.description: Creates rounded buttons of different sizes by tiling a single asset.

mods.title: Tiled Background
mods.description: Fills the entire screen by tiling a single asset.

mods.title: Timeline
mods.description: Demonstrates a basic use of the Piu Timeline class.

mods.title: Transitions
mods.description: Demonstrates a basic use of the built-in transitions that use the Piu Transition class.

mods.title: Wi-Fi Status Icon
mods.description: Displays an animated Wi-Fi status icon.

mods.title: Custom Text
mods.description: Displays custom text onscreen

app.title: Commodetto host
app.author: Moddable
app.description: Host for applications that use the Commodetto graphics library

mods.title: Random Rectangles
mods.description: Renders randomly colored rectangles of random sizes at random locations

mods.title: Text Shadow
mods.description: Draws text with a drop shadow effect

mods.title: Wi-Fi Icons
mods.description: Draws four Wi-Fi status icons to demonstrate how to draw a portion of an image

mods.title: JPEG
mods.description: Demonstrates how to decompress a full-screen (240 x 320) JPEG image directly to the screen

mods.title: Train
mods.description: Create a spotlight effect around an image of a train using a circle mask

app.title: BLE host
app.author: Moddable
app.description: Host for applications that use BLE

mods.title: Heart Rate Monitor
mods.description: Advertises the standard Heart Rate and Battery services, accepts connection requests from Centrals, sends notifications for simulated heart rate values, and responds to read requests from a Client for a simulated battery level.

mods.title: Heart Rate Monitor - Secure
mods.description: Advertises the standard Heart Rate and Battery services, accepts connection requests from Centrals, sends notifications for simulated heart rate values, and responds to read requests from a Client for a simulated battery level.

mods.title: Scanner
mods.description: Implements a Central that scans for nearby Peripherals and traces their names to the console.

mods.title: Text Client
mods.description: Implements a Central that connects to a Peripheral and receives text data via characteristic value change notifications.

app.title: Network host
app.author: Moddable
app.description: Host for applications that use Wi-Fi and networking protocols including HTTP, WebSocket, and MQTT

mods.title: HTTP GET - JSON
mods.description: Retrieves weather data from openweathermap.org and traces it to the console.

mods.title: Access Point
mods.description: Shows how to turn your device into an access point.

mods.title: HTTP GET
mods.description: Performs an HTTP GET to get the home page from the web server www.example.com.

mods.title: HTTPS GET
mods.description: Performs an HTTPS GET to get the home page from the web server www.example.com.

mods.title: HTTP POST
mods.description: Makes a POST call to a web server with a JSON request body.

mods.title: HTTP Server GET
mods.description: Responds to each request with plain text that indicates the HTTP method used for the response and the path of the HTTP resource requested.

mods.title: HTTP Server PUT
mods.description: Creates a JSON echo server which replies to every message it receives by sending back that message.

mods.title: HTTP GET - Streaming
mods.description: Shows how to make a streaming HTTP GET request.

mods.title: HTTP Server GET - Streaming
mods.description: Shows how to stream a response. Generates a response of random length containing random integers from 1 to 100.

mods.title: HTTP Server PUT - Streaming
mods.description: Shows how to stream a request. Logs an arbitrarily large text request to the debug console.

mods.title: mDNS Advertise
mods.description: Shows how to advertise a service using mDNS.

mods.title: mDNS Claim Name
mods.description: Shows the process of claiming a name for use on the local network.

mods.title: mDNS Discover
mods.description: Shows how to search for all the web servers advertising on your local network using mDNS.

mods.title: MQTT
mods.description: Creates an MQTT server that traces messages it receives to the console.

mods.title: SNTP
mods.description: Sets the time on the device using the current time pulled from the time server at pool.ntp.org.

mods.title: WebSocket Client
mods.description: Implements a WebSocket client designed to connect to an echo server

mods.title: WebSocket Server
mods.description: Implements a WebSocket echo server

app.title: Hardware host
app.author: Moddable
app.description: Host for applications that use sensors and actuators

mods.title: Blink
mods.description: Blinks the on-board LED

mods.title: Button - on-board
mods.description: Reads the on-board button

mods.title: Button - external
mods.description: Reads an external button

mods.title: Servo
mods.description: Rotates a servo from 0 degrees up to 180 degrees, 2.5 degrees at a time

mods.title: Temperature - TMP102
mods.description: Reads the temperature from a TMP102 sensor and traces the value in degrees Celsius to the debug console

mods.title: Temperature - TMP36
mods.description: Reads the temperature from a TMP36 sensor and traces the value in degrees Celsius to the debug console

mods.title: Tricolor LED - digital
mods.description: Uses the Digital class to control a tri-color LED

mods.title: Tricolor LED - PWM
mods.description: Uses the PWM class to control a tri-color LED
